ITTIA DB IoT C API Reference  8.4.1
Data Fields
db_auth_info_t Struct Reference
C API » Database

Authorization credentials for a password-protected or encrypted database. More...

#include <ittia/db.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t cipher_type
 Cipher for encrypted storage. More...
 
const void * cipher_data
 Symmetric encryption key or user cipher data.
 
uint32_t cipher_data_size
 Size of cipher_data. More...
 
const db_ansi_t * user_name
 User name, if required to open a storage or connect.
 
const db_ansi_t * password
 Password, if required to open a storage or connect.
 

Detailed Description

Authorization credentials for a password-protected or encrypted database.

Field Documentation

◆ cipher_type

db_auth_info_t::cipher_type

Cipher for encrypted storage.

One of:

  • DB_CIPHER_NONE
  • DB_CIPHER_USER
  • DB_CIPHER_AES128_CTR
  • DB_CIPHER_AES256_CTR

◆ cipher_data_size

db_auth_info_t::cipher_data_size

Size of cipher_data.

For best results, use 128 with DB_CIPHER_AES128_CTR and 256 with DB_CIPHER_AES256_CTR.
